entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow with ice pellets in the afternoon and with rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
